headline: Does Williams (WMB) Boosting Its Longtime Dividend Signal Enduring Strength in Its Capital Allocation Strategy?
summary: The Williams Companies, Inc. recently approved a regular quarterly dividend of US$0.525 per share, or US$2.10 annualized, payable on March 30, 2026, to shareholders of record as of March 13, 2026, representing a 5% increase from the fourth-quarter 2025 payout. This latest raise extends a dividend track record that dates back to 1974, underscoring the company’s long-standing focus on consistent shareholder returns. With this higher regular dividend as a backdrop, we’ll examine how Williams’...
